column5: Hey you North Bay Guys could you tell me if the shad fly hatch is on and if so , did it just start or has it been going for a while. Heading up to Callander tomorrow for a week and want to know how tough it will be. Need to get my stratagy planned Thanks Scooter
It was on 2 weeks ago during the Lakair get together. I don't know how long it lasts.

It's on, maybe not in full swing yet but close, I was out last night and the smallmouth were really keyed on shad flies, i saw fish rising all over the place and after trying a bunch of different things i managed one hit, shoulda brought the fly rod.
don't let the fly hatch deter you any.Against popular belief, it is one of the best times to slay pickerel...
i can't speak for pickerel, but i would agree in principal for bass. my best bass fishing of the year is done with small grubs during mayfly hatches.
